title: Effect when actual inflation less than expected

content.question: Which of the following would be true if the actual rate of inflation were less than the expected rate of inflation?

choices.label: The real interest rate had exceeded the nominal interest rate.
The real interest rate had been negative.
People who borrowed funds at the nominal interest rate during this time period would lose.
The economy would expand because of the increased investment and spending.

content.answer: People who borrowed funds at the nominal interest rate during this time period would lose.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
